personalInfo.title: Senior Software Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years specializing in frontend development and cloud architecture. Passionate about creating scalable, user-friendly applications with modern technologies.

experience.description: Lead frontend development for enterprise SaaS platform with React and TypeScript.
achievements: Reduced bundle size by 45% through code splitting and lazy loading
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 70%
Mentored junior developers and established frontend best practices

experience.description: Developed web applications using React, Node.js and MongoDB.
achievements: Built real-time dashboard using WebSockets reducing data latency by 90%
Integrated payment processing system handling M in monthly transactions
Optimized database queries resulting in 60% faster page loads

experience.description: Developed websites and web applications for various clients.
achievements: Created responsive designs for 20+ client websites
Implemented SEO best practices improving client search rankings by 35%
Developed custom WordPress plugins for e-commerce functionality

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Focus on distributed systems and machine learning
achievements: Teaching Assistant for Algorithms course
Research project on distributed database systems

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
education.description: Computer engineering with minor in mathematics
achievements: Dean's List all semesters

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
